data.name: LoveKami -Divinity Stage- Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The complete soundtrack for LoveKami -Divinity Stage- is now available!

*Total 36 tracks in mp3, flac, wav format.

01. Color of Dreams
02. Color of Spring
03. Color of Two Hearts
04. Color of Rainbows
05. Color of Dreams(instrumental)
06. Color of Spring(instrumental)
07. Color of Two Hearts(instrumental)
08. Color of Rainbows(instrumental)
09. Beginning
10. Sunshine Sneakers
11. Autumn Harvest Festival
12. A Moment in Winter
13. Spring's Morning
14. Fluttering Cherry Blossoms
15. Misty Moonlight Melody
16. A Midsummer Night's Party!
17. Street of Dreams
18. More and More
19. Relax and Go!
20. Perfect Akiba Day
21. Hardworking Goddess
22. Infinity
23. Festival Fun!
24. Strange Dance
25. Eloquent Memories
26. Purification Ceremony
27. Whisked Away
28. Never Gonna Give It Up
29. Divine Refuge
30. Land of Rising Stars
31. Rising Sun, Falling Moon
32. Here and Now
33. Pleasant Promise
34. Sunny Day Dream
35. Secret
36. Awakening

Due to copyright, the two songs below are not included in this soundtrack.
  • Featured Song: "Start Line"
  • Ending Theme: "Shooting Star"

data.short_description: Complete soundtrack for LoveKami -Divinity Stage- is now available!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics or higher (VRAM 512MB)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: An environment that can display at least 1280×720 pixels Recommended Environment: *When using display adaptors that share main memory, the game may not work. *We do not guarantee that this game will run on virtual drives or Virtual PCs (including Apple Boot Camp). *This product uses Ogg Vorbis/Lua/tilua++. The operating environments for this product are the same as for the demo version.
